synopsis.text:
Production I.G and Kodansha have teamed up to bring a new anime adaptation of Masamune Shirow's Ghost in the Shell manga to life. Set in the year 2045, the world is in a perpetual state of conflict due to the rapid advancement of artificial intelligence following a global financial crisis known as the "Synchronised Global Default." Governments harness AI as weapons, engaging in continuous warfare to maintain their economies. In this tumultuous landscape, full-body cyborg Major Motoko Kusanagi and her deputy Batou find themselves leaving Public Security Section 9 to become mercenaries.

Navigating the remnants of America's West Coast, Kusanagi and her team employ their honed skills from their time at Section 9 to tackle various operations related to the ongoing proxy wars. However, their seemingly straightforward missions take a turn for the worse when they cross paths with a new breed of adversaries: "Post-Humans." These cybernetically enhanced individuals possess extraordinary intelligence and physical abilities, pushing the boundaries of human potential.

As the emergence of Post-Humans creates a hidden conflict, a seemingly simple job of tracking down an arms dealer entangles Kusanagi's mercenary group, GHOST, in a complex web of events. In response to the escalating global threat, Public Security Section 9 reunites under Kusanagi's leadership. With their new mission to prevent worldwide chaos, Kusanagi and her reestablished team confront the Post-Human menace head-on, aiming to counter the ever-evolving cyber threats that plague their world.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
